additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Each bottle contains the juice of: Apple (46.9%)*, Sweet Potato (35%), Pineapple (15.2%)*, Passionfruit (2.5%), Vitamin C, Food Acid (Citric Acid), Natural Flavours. *Reconstituted Juice

additionalProperty.name: Dietary
additionalProperty.value: No Added Sugars, No Preservatives, No Artificial Flavours or Colours, Source of Vitamin C

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not purchase unless cap and neckband are intact.

description: Campbell's V8 Pineapple Passion Fruit Juice
name: V8 Pineapple Passion Fruit Juice
